# All Flesh Fails (Trait)
## Overview
**All Flesh Fails**

You are a member of the Cult of [[Marena]]. Your sensuality attracts others, providing a +1 trait bonus to [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]]. Your vast knowledge of the flesh grants a +1 trait bonus to [[Heal (Skill)|Heal]] checks. [[Heal (Skill)|Heal]] and [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] are always class skills.

**Source:** Streets of Zobeck (Open Design), pg. 87
